page.title: 01NORTH OF CLACTON
page.content: This area, which we have been investigating is just south of{Weeley} and north of{Clacton.}It mainly consists of{arable}fields and farm buildings. There is one village to the east of the block. This is called{Weeley Heath {.}It is made up of a large housing estate, a garage, a public house, a post office and a{Methodist Church.} The main{Colchester-Clacton}road passes through the centre of this village. Also the main{Colchester-Clacton}rail line runs through the north of the block. The area is mainly inhabited by elderly people, most of whom are retired, and people interested in the agricultural side of life. It is also said to be a relatively cheap place to live.
